Clarks Beach boating tragedy: Kevin McQuire admits manslaughter after Gemma and Ryder Ferregel drowned https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/clarks-beach-boating-tragedy-kevin-mcquire-admits-manslaughter-after-gemma-and-ryder-ferregel-drowned/GRZ4DQ3SZ5A25FRRTPBMO7UF2I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/clarks-beach-boating-tragedy-kevin-mcquire-admits-manslaughter-after-gemma-and-ryder-ferregel-drowned/GRZ4DQ3SZ5A25FRRTPBMO7UF2I/ Ric StevensSkipper Kevin McQuire survived and will be sentenced for manslaughter later this year. Fri, 20 Sep 2024 20:23:29 +0000 Gemma Karen Ferregel and her 10-year-old son, Ryder, drowned when their boat capsized in Manukau Harbour; Ryder’s body was never recovered. Composite image / NZME/Supplied
Former Epsom Girls’ music teacher Peter Thomas loses court fight to keep sex with student details secret https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-epsom-girls-music-teacher-peter-thomas-loses-court-battle-to-keep-details-of-sex-with-student-secret/ PE7VYZ3XWBAI3PV7VZZ22SNBU4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/former-epsom-girls-music-teacher-peter-thomas-loses-court-battle-to-keep-details-of-sex-with-student-secret/ PE7VYZ3XWBAI3PV7VZZ22SNBU4/ Katie HarrisPeter Thomas took his fight for suppression to the High Court at Auckland. Fri, 20 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Peter Thomas, a former conductor of the Auckland Symphony Orchestra, has been found guilty of serious misconduct by the Teachers’ Disciplinary Tribunal after having sex with a student at Epsom Girls Grammar School. Photo / Supplied
